text: Yervand Manaryan (; 20 September 1924 â€“ 19 February 2020) was an Iranian-born Armenian actor. He was born in Arak. Manaryan's acting credits include Karine (1969), Morgan's Relative (1970), Chaos (1974), A Bride from the North (1975), Priekhali na konkurs povara... (1977), Arevik (1978), Captain Arakel (1986), Comrade Panjuni (1992), Le piano (2011) and Garegin Nzhdeh (2013). Manaryan died on 19 February 2020 in Yerevan. He was 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Armenian actors Category:Markazi Province Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Yervand Manaryan
